data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of Paraustrosimulium Wygodzinsky & Coscarón: reassignment of Austrosimulium colboi and description of P. obcidens n. sp. from Western Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Craig, Douglas A., Moulton, John K., Currie, Douglas C. (2017): Taxonomic revision of Paraustrosimulium Wygodzinsky & Coscarón: reassignment of Austrosimulium colboi and description of P. obcidens n. sp. from Western Australia. Zootaxa 4337 (4): 451-492, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4337.4.1
